# Pull Request

## What does this change do?

Explain like you're talking to a tired maintainer at 2am.

## Why is this needed?

Bug? Feature? Personal vendetta against a race condition?

## Type of change

* [ ] Bug fix
* [ ] Feature
* [ ] Refactor
* [ ] Docs
* [ ] I poked it and things happened

## How was this tested?

Describe actual tests, not vibes.

## Screenshots / Logs (if applicable)

Paste them here.

## Checklist

* [ ] I tested this locally
* [ ] I didn’t reformat the entire repo
* [ ] I wrote sane commit messages
* [ ] I read the contributing guide
* [ ] This probably won’t summon new bugs

## Notes for reviewers

Anything weird, risky, or slightly cursed goes here.
